queries.query: medium-sized monster that can mimic sounds and has a paralyzing gaze
queries.variant: monster that is medium-sized and can imitate animal sounds with a paralyzing gaze

queries.query: predatory creature with high strength that lives in various environments
queries.variant: predatory beast that has strong strength and can adapt to different surroundings

queries.query: cunning evil monster that attacks with bite and claw
queries.variant: evil creature that's clever and uses bite and claw to attack

queries.query: fast monster with stealth abilities resistant to metal attacks
queries.variant: swift creature that has stealth skills and is resistant to damage from metal weapons

queries.query: monster immune to being charmed that utilizes mimicry in combat
queries.variant: creature that's immune to charm effects and uses mimicry during fights
